body:
Mark Stock wrote:
> I am ashamed to admit that I just comment out line 516 in raytrace.c

>   //error(CONSISTENCY, "zero ray direction in localhit");


Haha!  Don't worry Mark, the Bush Administration is doing similar things 
to the Constitution.


-Rob
